subject: Hockey, Ice
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray was fired Saturday as coach of the St. Louis Blues, who have lost four straight games and have the N.H.L.’s worst home record. Davis Payne, the coach of the Blues’ American Hockey League affiliate in Peoria, was appointed interim coach.
